data.question: How many different products do we sell at ZTC?
data.answer: ZTC currently has 3 products on the market. Hibiscus tea with a hint of one of Lemon/Pineapple or ginger.

data.question: What online stores sell our products?
How many people work at ZTC?
data.answer: ZTC currently employs 250 people from 21 different countries.
